title: Digital Transformation with Thomson Reuters
itunes:title: Digital Transformation with Thomson Reuters
description: Host Hanish Patel is joined by Steve Hasker, president and CEO at Thomson Reuters, and Janet Foutty, executive chair of the board at Deloitte US, to discuss how businesses can build agility and resilience through digital transformation.
content:encoded: Host Hanish Patel is joined by Steve Hasker, president and CEO at Thomson Reuters, and Janet Foutty, executive chair of the board at Deloitte US, to discuss how businesses can build agility and resilience through digital transformation.
itunes:subtitle: Host Hanish Patel is joined by Steve Hasker, president and CEO at Thomson Reuters, and Janet Foutty, executive chair of the board at Deloitte US, to discuss how businesses can build agility and resilience through digital transformation.
itunes:author: Deloitte US
